# mClassDescription

**Instance Property**

A structure that describes an audio codec.

## Declaration

```swift
var mClassDescription: AudioClassDescription
```

## Discussion

An [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreAudioTypes/AudioClassDescription] struct that specifies the codec to be used.
title: mClassDescription
